Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.deezer.sdk.model.AImageOwner
    see ImageOwnerEntity instead
    com.deezer.sdk.player.ArtistRadioPlayer
    The Deezer Radios are now unified in a single model, and can all be played using the RadioPlayer.
    com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck.WifiAndMobileNetworkStateChecker
    Use NetworkStateCheckerFactory.wifiAndMobile() instead
    com.deezer.sdk.player.networkcheck.WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker
    Use NetworkStateCheckerFactory.wifiOnly() instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.deezer.sdk.model.Album.getCoverUrl()
    The Album.getSmallImageUrl(), Album.getMediumImageUrl() or Album.getBigImageUrl() should be used instead
    com.deezer.sdk.model.Album.getGenreId()
    use the Â Album.getGenres() method instead
    com.deezer.sdk.model.AImageOwner.getImageUrl(AImageOwner.ImageSize)
    The ImageOwnerEntity.getSmallImageUrl(), ImageOwnerEntity.getMediumImageUrl() or ImageOwnerEntity.getBigImageUrl() should be used instead
    com.deezer.sdk.model.Artist.getPictureUrl()
    The Artist.getSmallImageUrl(), Artist.getMediumImageUrl() or Artist.getBigImageUrl() should be used instead
    com.deezer.sdk.model.Playlist.getPictureUrl()
    The Playlist.getSmallImageUrl(), Playlist.getMediumImageUrl() or Playlist.getBigImageUrl() should be used instead
    com.deezer.sdk.model.Radio.getPictureUrl()
    The Radio.getSmallImageUrl(), Radio.getMediumImageUrl() or Radio.getBigImageUrl() should be used instead
    com.deezer.sdk.model.User.getPictureUrl()
    The User.getSmallImageUrl(), User.getMediumImageUrl() or User.getBigImageUrl() should be used instead
    com.deezer.sdk.model.Album.getTracks()
    to get the list of tracks of the album, use the DeezerRequestFactory.requestAlbumTracks(long) request
    com.deezer.sdk.model.Playlist.getTracks()
    com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer.playRadio(long)
    this method defaults to a thematic radio. You should use the explicit RadioPlayer.playRadio(RadioType, long) to define the type of radio to play
    com.deezer.sdk.network.request.DeezerRequestFactory.requestArtistRadio(long)
    Use the DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioTracks(com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer.RadioType, long) method instead with RadioPlayer.RadioType.ARTIST as parameter
    com.deezer.sdk.network.request.DeezerRequestFactory.requestArtistRadioCurrentTrack(long)
    Use the DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioCurrentTrack(com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer.RadioType, long) method instead with RadioPlayer.RadioType.ARTIST as parameter
    com.deezer.sdk.network.request.DeezerRequestFactory.requestArtistRadioNextTrack(long)
    Use the DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioNextTrack(com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer.RadioType, long) method instead with RadioPlayer.RadioType.ARTIST as parameter
    com.deezer.sdk.network.request.DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioCurrentTrack(long)
    Use the DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioCurrentTrack(com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer.RadioType, long) method instead
    com.deezer.sdk.network.request.DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioNextTrack(long)
    Use the DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioNextTrack(com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer.RadioType, long) method instead
    com.deezer.sdk.network.request.DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioTracks(long)
    Use the DeezerRequestFactory.requestRadioTracks(com.deezer.sdk.player.RadioPlayer.RadioType, long) method instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.deezer.sdk.network.connect.DeezerConnect(Context, String)
    Use DeezerConnect.Builder instead
    com.deezer.sdk.network.connect.DeezerConnect(String)
    Use DeezerConnect.Builder instead
